project.description:
Yocto Sumo Source Setup
매주 화, 목일 오후 10시 trigger됨.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "***************************************" echo " Jenkins - Yocto environment setup " echo "***************************************"
export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 tiny " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-navi-ref tiny -c
echo "************************************" echo " Yocto Sumo s5p4418 qt " echo "************************************" ./tools/build.sh s5p4418-navi-ref qt -c
